channel.title: Change ip doesent work
channel.description: um i have a weird client because i changed the ip in egui and in client.java and it still connects to localhost on my computer and then when the client is on the other computer it does it aswell. connects to localhost instead of the assigned ip. also on the 3rd computer tested we got the ip to work (didnt know how we did it) and it wont connect to the server now (yes im portforwarded and yes no-ip is on) on the moparscape client my server works but on my client i cant get it to work any ideas?
